snippet: Los Angeles acquired the best big man of the era — for the second time since signing Shaquille O’Neal in 1996 — and with Steve Nash, can also claim the N.B.A.’s top starting backcourt.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column on Los Angeles Lakers acquiring premier center Dwight Howard, who he calls the best big man of the era.

byline.contributor: Greg Bishop contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: Los Angeles acquired the best big man of the era — for the second time since signing Shaquille O’Neal in 1996 — and with Steve Nash, can also claim the N.B.A.’s top starting backcourt.

headline.seo: Dwight Howard Trade Gives Lakers Large Piece of Puzzle
headline.main: Lakers Again Land a Large Piece of the Puzzle
headline.print_headline: Lakers Again Land Large Piece of Puzzle
